Package ca.queensu.cs.cisc124.notes.utilityclasses

Class Strings

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.queensu.cs.cisc124.notes.utilityclasses.Strings
  • public class Strings
extends Object
    Utility class containing methods that operate on String instances.

      Returns the Hamming distance between two strings.

      Returns true if s is a palindrome, false otherwise.

      Returns a new string equal to c repeated n times.

    • Method Detail

      • hammingDistance

        public static int hammingDistance​(String s,
                                  String t)
        Returns the Hamming distance between two strings.
        Parameters:
        s - a string
        t - a string
        Returns:
        the Hamming distance between the two strings
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if s or t is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if s and t have different lengths

      • isPalindrome

        public static boolean isPalindrome​(String s)
        Returns true if s is a palindrome, false otherwise. A string is a palindrome if it is equal to the reversal of itself.
        Parameters:
        s - a string
        Returns:
        true if s is a palindrom, false otherwise

      • repeat

        public static String repeat​(char c,
                            int n)
        Returns a new string equal to c repeated n times. Returns an empty string if n <= 0.
        Parameters:
        c - a character to repeat
        n - the number of times to repeat the character
        Returns:
        a new string equal to repeated n times

      • reverse

        public static String reverse​(String s)
        Returns a new string having the characters of s in reverse order. Returns the empty string if s == null is true.
        Parameters:
        s - a string
        Returns:
        a new string having the characters of s in reverse order
